fields.label: Header Content - Type of Content
fields.name: page_header_content_type
fields.instructions: Specify the type of content that should be displayed within the header.  Choose "Title and subtitle" to display a styled page title and optional subtitle, or choose "Custom content" to add any arbitrary content.  If "Custom content" is selected, a page title and subtitle are NOT included by default and should be added manually.

fields.label: Header Title Text
fields.name: page_header_title
fields.instructions: Overrides the page title.

fields.label: Page h1
fields.name: page_header_h1
fields.instructions: Specify which part of the page title to use as the h1 for the page.  Styling of the title/subtitle will not be affected by this choice.

fields.label: Header Height (sm+)
fields.name: page_header_height
fields.instructions: Height of the page header at the -sm breakpoint and above.

fields.label: Header Image (-sm+)
fields.name: page_header_image
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -sm breakpoint and up.

fields.label: Header Image (-xs)
fields.name: page_header_image_xs
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -xs breakpoint.

fields.label: Header Video (MP4)
fields.name: page_header_mp4
fields.instructions: If a MP4 video is defined, video will be used instead of an image in the header at the -sm breakpoint and higher.  Note that videos will never be displayed at the -xs breakpoint, so a fallback header image should always be provided when using video.

fields.label: Header Video (WebM)
fields.name: page_header_webm
fields.instructions: Supplemental video format used by supported browsers for optimized performance.  Note that a MP4 must at least be provided for video to be displayed in the header.

fields.label: Header Video Loop
fields.name: page_header_video_loop
fields.instructions: If checked, and a header video is available, the header video will loop indefinitely.

fields.label: Exclude Primary Site Navigation
fields.name: page_header_exclude_nav
fields.instructions: Controls whether or not the primary site navigation should be displayed at the top of the page.

fields.label: Include Subnavigation
fields.name: page_header_include_subnav
fields.instructions: Enable this setting to display an affixed subnavigation bar below the page header.  Requires the Automatic Sections Menu plugin to be activated, and for at least one section within the page's content to be configured to appear in the navbar.

fields.label: Subnavigation Link Population
fields.name: page_header_subnav_link_population
fields.instructions: Specify how links in the subnavigation menu should be populated.  By default, the menu will be populated automatically based on sections included in the page.

choices.custom: Use a custom set of links

sub_fields.label: URL
sub_fields.name: href
sub_fields.instructions: Accepts a standard URL (e.g. "https://www.ucf.edu/") or page anchor ("#my-anchor").

sub_fields.label: Relationships ("rel" Attribute)
sub_fields.name: rel
sub_fields.instructions: Add a list of link types, separated by a single space (e.g. "noopener nofollow"). See link types information for more information.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: Specify a custom layout for how this individual link is displayed. Requires a custom layout to be registered for Section Menu Items in the Automatic Section Menus plugin. See the Automatic Section Menus plugin documentation for more information.

fields.label: Group Navigation Text
fields.name: group_navigation_text
fields.instructions: When this field and the page below are defined, an additional link will be added into the header allowing users to browse back to a group or listing page.

fields.label: Group Navigation Page
fields.name: group_navigation_page
fields.instructions: The page the group navigation link will go to.

fields.label: Section
fields.name: promotional_section_one
fields.instructions: Select the promotional section to insert.

fields.label: Section Label
fields.name: promotional_section_one_label
fields.instructions: The label of the promotional section. Required for accessibility.

fields.label: Section
fields.name: promotional_section_two
fields.instructions: Select the promotional section to insert.

fields.label: Section Label
fields.name: promotional_section_two_label
fields.instructions: The label of the promotional section. Required for accessibility.

fields.label: Section
fields.name: promotional_section_footer
fields.instructions: Select the promotional section to insert above the footer.

fields.label: Section Label
fields.name: promotional_section_footer_label
fields.instructions: The label of the promotional section. Required for accessibility.

fields.label: News Feed Type
fields.name: cluster_news_feed_type
fields.instructions: Choose whether to consume a news feed or curate a specific list of stories.

fields.label: News Feed Topic
fields.name: cluster_news_feed_topic
fields.instructions: Enter the topic to filter news by.

fields.label: News Stories
fields.name: cluster_news_stories
fields.instructions: Select the news stories to display for this cluster.

sub_fields.label: Story Source
sub_fields.name: story_source
sub_fields.instructions: Select the source of the news story.

sub_fields.label: Today URL
sub_fields.name: today_url
sub_fields.instructions: The URL of the Today story.

sub_fields.label: Pegasus URL
sub_fields.name: pegasus_url
sub_fields.instructions: The URL of the Pegasus Magazine story.

fields.label: Projects
fields.name: cluster_projects
fields.instructions: Select the research projects for this cluster.

fields.label: Publications
fields.name: cluster_publications
fields.instructions: Select the publications related to this cluster.

fields.label: Program Lead Copy
fields.name: cluster_program_lead_copy
fields.instructions: The text to display above the degree search. Limited to one paragraph of no more than 300 characters.

fields.label: Programs
fields.name: cluster_programs
fields.instructions: List the programs associated with this research cluster.

sub_fields.label: Program URL
sub_fields.name: program_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the URL of the program profile page.

fields.label: Cluster Leads
fields.name: cluster_leads
fields.instructions: List the lead faculty members of this cluster.

sub_fields.label: Cluster Lead Full Title
sub_fields.name: cluster_lead_title
sub_fields.instructions: The full title of the faculty cluster lead.

fields.label: Faculty
fields.name: cluster_faculty
fields.instructions: List the faculty members associated with this cluster.

fields.label: Post Docs and Students
fields.name: cluster_students
fields.instructions: Select the post docs and students associated with this cluster.

fields.label: Colleges Image
fields.name: cluster_colleges_image
fields.instructions: Adds an image above the college heading.

fields.label: Images Classes
fields.name: cluster_colleges_image_classes
fields.instructions: Add additional CSS classes to the Colleges Image

fields.label: Colleges Heading
fields.name: cluster_colleges_heading
fields.instructions: The heading above the colleges/centers listing.

fields.label: Associated Colleges and Centers
fields.name: cluster_colleges
fields.instructions: List the colleges and centers associated with this research cluster.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: college_name
sub_fields.instructions: The name of the college or center.

sub_fields.label: URL
sub_fields.name: college_url
sub_fields.instructions: The homepage of the college or center.

fields.label: Events Feed
fields.name: cluster_events_feed
fields.instructions: The URL of the events calendar to display.

fields.label: Related Social
fields.name: cluster_related_tweets
fields.instructions: Add the URLs to relevant tweet or facebook posts.

sub_fields.label: Social Post
sub_fields.name: social_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Paste in the URL of the Facebook post or tweet.

fields.label: Short Description
fields.name: cluster_short_desc
fields.instructions: The description that is shown when the cluster is listed with the other faculty clusters.
